name: The Asteroids I Call Home
description:
Made for Ludum Dare Game Jam #30

View our entry and vote if you entered here: http://www.ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-30/?action=preview&uid=12839

Mining ships have invading your peaceful asteroid sanctuary. Defend your home the only way you know how: violently bashing through spaceships. Fly at highspeeds with the help of your jet pack and the gravitational pull of nearby asteroids. Stop the minors by breaking their chains, ships and defense droids.

Controls:

Keyboard

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Space Bar - Jump

P - Pause

M - Mute

ESC - Quit Game/Return to previous menu

R - Quick restart from gameover/highscore page

Scroll wheel - Zooming in and out during gameplay

XBOX 360 Controller (Windows)

Left Analog Stick - Move

A - Jump

Start - Pause

Mute - Y

Back - Quit/Return to previous menu

X - Quick restart from gameover/highscore page
